input.name: Search
input.onclick: if(Keyword.length<3){alert('Your Keyword has to be atleast 3 characters long.\n\nPlease enter a valid Keyword.');};

table.style: height: 275px; width: 988; align: center; margin-top: 27px; margin-bottom: 20px;

iframe.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

p.span: La Cima Elementary Charter School from Inspired Storytellers on Vimeo.
